questions.text: The language family that descended from Latin are called the ------- languages.
Enumerate the five biggest Romance languages.

As per Q4, Simoun is actually the new identity of ---------- ------.
In Dragonball Z, Goku's skill "Spirit bomb" is known in Japanese as ----- ----.
What international company has its logo called "The Golden Arches"?
Who was the last Airbender, who would later on become the Avatar?
The "G" in saxophonist Kenny G's name is what?
Which video game character is also known as the "Blue Bomber"?
This Austrian archduke's assassination started World War I.  Who is he?
In Street Fighter lore, who were the original Four Kings?
ENIAC was the first electronic general-purpose computer.  Define ENIAC.
The first "P" on the server-side scripting language PHP is?
A ---------- is a word, phrase, number, or other sequence of characters which reads the same backward or forward.  Example: racecar.
Enumerate the three legendary birds from the Pokemon first generation.
This Latin phrase means "where are you going?" in English
------ -- is the phenomenon of experiencing a situation that one recognizes in some fashion, but that nonetheless seems very unfamiliar.  It's kind of like an opposite to deja vu.
Norway, Sweden, and Finland are just three countries that use a cross design on their flags.  What do you call this cross?
What is the scientific name of the western lowland gorilla?
The term AD or A.D. is  used to label or number years in the Julian and Gregorian calendars.  Define AD.
The auroch is a grand extinct wild ox that is the ancenstor of the ---.
Before Elizabeth II, who was the longest reigning British monarch?
"Bovine spongiform encephalopathy" is the technical term for --- --- disease.
What is the capital city of Norway?
-- ----------- was an organization created in Spain on December 13, 1888, composed of Filipino liberals exiled in 1872 and students attending Europe's universities.
This very popular game actually came from a mod of Warcraft III.
What are the three words to call the meat of a sheep?
A ------- is a powerful object in which a Dark wizard or witch has hidden a fragment of his or her soul for the purpose of attaining immortality
This celebrity has "Destiny Hope" as her real first name.  Give the full name of this individual.
